titleStmt.title: Belinda's pretty, pretty, pleasing form does my happy, happy, happy, happy fancy charm a song / set by Mr. John Eccles ; sung by Mr. Gouge in the farce call'd women will have their wills ; exactly engrav'd by Tho. Cross.
titleStmt.author: Eccles, John, d. 1735.
Cross, T. (Thomas)

notesStmt.note: Statement of responsibility transposed from head of title.
